long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AuthTabsSync is a browser extension designed to streamline your web browsing experience by automatically managing your tabs during sign-in or sign-out actions. When you log into or out of a website, the extension detects the event and either reloads or closes all tabs with the same hostname, ensuring that your session state is consistent across all open tabs. This ensures a seamless and efficient browsing experience, keeping your session information up-to-date and reducing the hassle of manual tab management.
